subject: Football
lead_paragraph: The Giants’ ground game, for all of the preseason talk about reinvention, had an up-and-down showing against the Jaguars’ first-team defense during Friday’s preseason game.
snippet: The Giants’ ground game, for all of the preseason talk about reinvention, had an up-and-down showing against the Jaguars’ first-team defense during Friday’s preseason game.
